name: VolleyGames

Invocation Name: volley games
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Play the classic game by matching wits with a clever AI, asking "yes or no" questions as you narrow it down to guess the mystery object!

THE FIRST VOICE-CONTROLLED AI PARTY GAME
◆ Real conversational interactions with an intelligent AI quizmaster!
◆ Hints, clever quips, and countless puzzles to solve!
Volley's 20 Questions uses the latest in voice and AI technology to craft a fun and exciting experience for the whole family to enjoy!

DISCLAIMER: This skill uses generative AI, as a result, some responses are made up.

FEEDBACK
Email us at support@volleythat.com if you have any issues or feedback. We'd love to hear from you!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
